Text: We can't begin to know it
But then our data’s growing strong…
Who knew our posters would run this long?
Good trials never felt so good! (So good! So good! So good!)
To run more blocks than I should
We squint and try to name them
Is that an outlier or just noise?
Fix one bug and break twenty
But when it finally runs— We cheer with joy!
Good fits never looked so good! (So good! So good! So good!)
To trust my model more than I should
VSS never felt so good! (So good! So good! So good!)
VSS never felt so good! (So good! So good! So good!)
VSS never felt so good! Oh no no
